##last seen

on kallie‚Äôs recommendation, sarah and i went to the fundaci√≥ joan mir√≥ in barcelona. the museum itself was designed specifically to host his sculptures and paintings, and it‚Äôs a delight architecturally. there are unexpected windows, terraces looking out over the city, a rooftop with sculptures hidden around every corner, nooks and crannies, staircases, rounded curves and sharp edges. i loved the feeling that the space itself was part of the curation, that someone had thought carefully about the placement of everything, down to where to add a little window so you could observe the details of a big sculpture from above.
